author: Kramer
description: The canonical orchestration layer for dealership agentic funnel intelligence. Unifies role-aware strategy, funnel analytics, AI visibility metrics, and visual storytelling across dealership, OEM, and marketplace ecosystems.

funnel_visualization.render_mode: minimalist white background, teal/violet dual funnel

dashboard_visualization.render_mode: data-centric panels, high contrast typography, teal/violet accents

trajectory_visualization.render_mode: wide-screen gradient background, ascending trajectory, labeled KPIs

role_awareness.Dealer Principal: Focus on market truth, gross efficiency, and AI-driven profitability.
role_awareness.General Manager: Operational flow clarity and team accountability through AI funnel transparency.
role_awareness.Marketing Director: AI visibility optimization, reputation leverage, and cross-platform schema strength.
role_awareness.Used Car Manager: Inventory velocity, trust ranking, and AI-based remarketing insights.

render_logic.style_enforcement: consistent teal/violet palette, minimalist, cinematic motion aesthetic

notes: Canonical baseline of DealershipAI dAI Agent + Agentic Commerce Intelligence stack.
Includes runtime, wit logic, headline intelligence, visualization, and CI validation.
Use pulse-agent-builder.ts to generate and version future Agentic GPT configs.
